name: RandomStages environment
body: Update with new `RandomStages` environment that samples stages at random.

name: Update README
body: Fix links in README for PyPi

name: Revert is_stage_over for performance
body: the older iterative implementation outperforms the current vectorized numpy implementation. Reverting for the better performance (and more understandable code).

name: Update nes-py
body: update the version of nes-py

name: Implement get_action_meanings in random stages environment
body: Implement the `get_action_meanings` method in the `SuperMarioBrosRandomStagesEnv` environment.

name: Fix RNG to work with Gym
body: fix the RNG name to work with gym wrappers.

name: Remove Initialization of RNG
body: Initialize RNG in nes-py base environment for compatibility with wrappers.

name: Fix CLI
body: Remove deprecated usage of deprecated `wrap` feature in `nes-py`

name: Update NES-py version
body: Update nes-py version that has a breaking change in it.

name: Change Random Levels to Random Stages
body: better consistency with naming schemes in the project and the game in general.

name: Random Levels Environment
body: an environment for selecting random levels.

name: Don't stall for a frame on environment initialization
body: This is no longer necessary with the SimpleNES emulator.

name: Remove Frameskip
body: nes-py deprecated the frameskip functionality in the environment, putting it in a wrapper instead.

name: Fix Level Environments
body: Restore proper `reset` functionality of level environments and introduce a speed up to all calls to `reset` using save states instead of completely restarting the machine.

name: NES-py RAM Buffer
body: Update to nes-py 4.0.0 and the direct RAM access feature to reduce CPU instructions for RAM access in environments.

name: Update Dependencies
body: Update versions of dependencies in the setup.py script.

name: Resolve bug in reset
body: resolve bug in reset where the start screen image was showing to agents.

name: Fix lives in info dictionary
body: remove the unnecessary 1 added to the life counter in the info dictionary

name: Fix Graphical Glitch
body: resolve the graphical glitch by removing usage of the backup/restore feature in the nes-py emulator.

name: Up Movement in COMPLEX_MOVEMENT
body:
1. resolve a bug where touching a vine caused a reset in a level environment
2. add the `up` controller input to the COMPLEX_MOVEMENT list

name: Add status flag to info dictionary
body:
info dictionary now contains the `status` key as a string in _{'small', 'tall', 'fireball'}_ indicating Mario's status.


| Key        | Type   | Description                                           |
|:-----------|:-------|:------------------------------------------------------|
| `coins   ` | `int`  | The number of collected coins                         |
| `flag_get` | `bool` | True if Mario reached a flag or ax                    |
| `life`     | `int`  | The current life, i.e., _{3, 2, 1}_                   |
| `score`    | `int`  | The cumulative in-game score                          |
| `stage`    | `int`  | The current stage, i.e., _{1, ..., 4}_                |
| `status`   | `str`  | Mario's status, i.e., _{'small', 'tall', 'fireball'}_ |
| `time`     | `int`  | The time left on the clock                            |
| `world`    | `int`  | The current world, i.e., _{1, ..., 8}_                |
| `x_pos`    | `int`  | Mario's _x_ position in the stage                     |

name: Fix Issue where static assets weren't deployed to PyPi
body: static build assets now deploy with source as expected

name: Fix issue with random screen shown between worlds
body: change structure for skipping end of world cut scene to omit a random frame that was making it into the agent buffer

name: Fix Bug with Python2 support and provide more info data
body:
1. remove use of enum package that isnt introduced until python 3.4
2. update the info dictionary to provide more rich information

| Key        | Type   | Description                            |
|:-----------|:-------|:---------------------------------------|
| `coins   ` | `int`  | The number of collected coins          |
| `flag_get` | `bool` | True if Mario reached a flag or ax     |
| `life`     | `int`  | The current life (i.e., {3, 2, 1})     |
| `score`    | `int`  | The cumulative in-game score           |
| `stage`    | `int`  | The current stage (i.e., {1, ..., 4})  |
| `time`     | `int`  | The time left on the clock             |
| `world`    | `int`  | The current world (i.e., {1, ..., 8})  |
| `x_pos`    | `int`  | Mario's x position in the stage        |

3. refactor internal code to be more readable and concise

name: Bump nes-py version to 1.1.0
body: Allow resizable windows for human play and the environment `(Env).render(mode='human')` method

name: Fix README
body:
-   fix formatting of math to render better
-   fix incorrect static value for death penalty

name: flag_get in info returned by step
body: implement a `flag_get` member of the info dict returned by step as True when Mario reaches a flag or ax and False otherwise.

name: Update License
body: Specify a proprietary license to bar use for anything beyond educational purposes.

name: Fix setup script
body: Resolve issue where 3.0.6 tag had the wrong version in `setup.py`

name: Fix end of level issues
body: Resolve issue with levels ending incorrectly in the level environment

name: Bump Version of nes-py
body: 0.11.0 incorporates windows support!

name: Bump Version of nes-py
body: 0.10.3 resolve a memory leak in the backup restore functionality

name: Bump version of nes-py
body: 0.10.2 incorporates small bug fixes to resolve c++ warnings on nes-py compilation during install

name: Bump Version of nes-py
body: Update to use 0.10.1 that resolves a bug where the joypad wasnt responding on debian systems.

name: Resolve a Graphical Bug
body: use the new restore feature in nes-py to handle resets and thus prevent the odd graphical glitch in #49.

name: Replace FCEUX with nes-py
body:
rip out FCEUX backend and replace with logic for nes-py. 

**Note that a severe bug exists in the graphics engine of this version**

name: UUID for Named Pipes
body: use the `uuid` package to generate unique pipe names for environments based on host ID and current time. This guarantees that single threaded parallelism is supported as well. i.e. pipelining in lock step or initializing environments _before_ instantiating parallelism.

name: Parallelism Support
body:
- fix named pipes to support 
    - shell level parallelism
    - `multiprocessing` parallelism
    - `threading` parallelism

name: Updated Action Space
body:
- simplify the action space
- no breaking API changes _per se_, but it does break the pseudo API defined for agents

name: Super Mario Bros: The Lost Levels
body: Introduce an additional ROM for the game Super Mario Bros: The Lost Levels hereafter referred to as Super Mario Bros 2 (the original name).

name: Fix structure of project for deployment to PyPi
